import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { CheckCircleIcon, ClipboardDocumentListIcon, ArrowTrendingUpIcon, UserGroupIcon, LightBulbIcon, StarIcon, ChartBarIcon, ClockIcon, ShieldCheckIcon, DevicePhoneMobileIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const About = () => { const features = [ { icon: CheckCircleIcon, title: 'Task Management', description: 'Create, edit, and organize your tasks with ease. Set priorities and due dates to stay on track.', color: 'from-green-500 to-green-600' }, { icon: ClipboardDocumentListIcon, title: 'Project Organization', description: 'Keep all your projects organized in one place with intuitive categorization and filtering.', color: 'from-blue-500 to-blue-600' }, { icon: ArrowTrendingUpIcon, title: 'Progress Tracking', description: 'Monitor your productivity with detailed analytics and completion tracking.', color: 'from-purple-500 to-purple-600' }, { icon: UserGroupIcon, title: 'Team Collaboration', description: 'Work together with your team members and share project progress seamlessly.', color: 'from-yellow-500 to-yellow-600' } ]; const benefits = [ 'Boost productivity by up to 40%', 'Never miss a deadline again', 'Streamlined workflow management', 'Real-time collaboration features', 'Comprehensive reporting tools', 'Mobile-friendly interface' ]; const stats = [ { value: '10K+', label: 'Active Users', icon: UserGroupIcon }, { value: '50K+', label: 'Tasks Completed', icon: CheckCircleIcon }, { value: '99.9%', label: 'Uptime', icon: ShieldCheckIcon }, { value: '4.8â˜…', label: 'User Rating', icon: StarIcon } ]; const containerVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }; const itemVariants = { hidden: { y: 20, opacity: 0 }, visible: { y: 0, opacity: 1, transition: { duration: 0.5, ease: "easeOut" } } }; const fadeInVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, transition: { duration: 0.6 } } }; return ( {/* Hero Section */}

ProjectFlow
